NO: A family of entrepreneurs, Hammie, Hamnett and August Hill founded ZeroKnowledge (now RadialPoint) and sold to AppDirect last year. Today, the Hills are invested in industries such as sustain foods, bitcoin, and communications. Hamnett is rocking the CEO role at Smooch.
